topics_and_summary.utils module¶

topics_and_summary.utils.pretty_print(text: str)[source]¶

Prints the given text with an underscore line below it.

topics_and_summary.utils.join_paths(path1: str, *paths) → str[source]¶
topics_and_summary.utils.get_abspath_from_project_source_root(_path: str) → str[source]¶

Returns the absolute path of the relative path passed as a parameter.

Parameters

_path – Path relative from the project source root (folder that contains an __init__.py file and the rest of the Python packages and modules).

topics_and_summary.utils.now_as_str() → str[source]¶
Returns

The current time as str.

topics_and_summary.utils.save_obj_to_disk(obj: object, name: str, folder_path: str = None)[source]¶

Stores an object on disk, using pickle.

Parameters

  • obj – Object to be stored in disk.

  • name – Name of the pickle file to be stored on disk.

  • folder_path – Path of the folder where the object will be stored on disk.

topics_and_summary.utils.load_obj_from_disk(name: str, folder_path: str = None) → object[source]¶

Loads a saved object from disk, using pickle.

Parameters

  • name – Name of the pickle file stored on disk.

  • folder_path – Path of the folder where the object is stored on disk.

Returns

The object loaded from disk.

topics_and_summary.utils.save_func_to_disk(func: Callable, name: str, folder_path: str = None)[source]¶

Stores a function on disk, using dill.

Parameters

  • func – Function to be stored in disk.

  • name – Name of the dill file to be stored on disk.

  • folder_path – Path of the folder where the function will be stored on disk.

topics_and_summary.utils.load_func_from_disk(name: str, folder_path: str = None) → Callable[source]¶

Loads a saved function from disk, using dill.

Parameters

  • name – Name of the dill file stored on disk.

  • folder_path – Path of the folder where the function is stored on disk.

Returns

The function loaded from disk.
